tns:patch.author: Constantin Dolghier
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_component_funding; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_component_funding AS SELECT f.activity_id AS amp_activity_id, f.amp_component_funding_id, f.amp_component_funding_id AS amp_fund_detail_id, c.title AS component_name, f.transaction_type, f.adjustment_type, adj.category_value AS adjustment_type_name, f.transaction_date, f.transaction_amount, f.currency_id, cu.currency_code, ct.name AS component_type FROM amp_component_funding f, amp_components c, amp_currency cu, amp_category_value adj, amp_component_type ct WHERE cu.amp_currency_id = f.currency_id AND f.amp_component_id = c.amp_component_id AND f.adjustment_type = adj.id AND ct.type_id = c.type ORDER BY f.activity_id;
